title: Auto reconnect with VNC - Feature request
author: RedPeace
body_snippet:
Hi,

## Expected Behavior
When a vnc controlled device restarts the tab should stay open and a "Reconnecting 1 of 10" message should appeare.
If the device is up again the connection is reestablished.

## Current Behavior
When a vnc controlled device is restarting the tab closes/disappeares without a message.

## Possible Solution
Integrate a configureable vnc reconnect setting. E.g. you can configure that after 5,10, 20.... unsuccessful reconnects the 
tab should close or stay with e...

iterations.description: Enhance existing VNC auto-reconnect functionality to improve robustness and user experience.

notes:
